title: Squares of a Sorted Array
problemStatement: Given an integer array nums sorted in non-decreasing order, return an array of the squares of each number, also sorted in non-decreasing order.

examples.explanation: Square each element: [16, 1, 0, 9, 100] âž sort the array to get [0, 1, 9, 16, 100].

approach:
1. Loop through the array and square each number.
2. Use JavaScript's `.sort()` method with a custom comparator to sort numerically.

Important: `.sort()` sorts strings by default, so we use `(a, b) => a - b` for numeric sort.
spaceComplexity: O(1) (in-place, ignoring output array if returned separately)
